content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my back yard at 7:30 pm, when i noticed a blight shinny object high in the sky to the southwest. first thought was it's too bright to be venus this early in the evening with the sun still up. looked at object with binoculars and it still just looked too shinny. started watching the object with a telescope, and it looked too shinny. kept watching the object with the telescope, because the brightness did not appear evenly across the surface, the object appeared to be moving, and there appeared to be an electrical pulsating effect on one side of the object. watched the object thru the telescope until 8:15 pm (45 mins.), and observed that the object was getting dimmer, instead of brighter; as you would expect a star or planet later in the evening. also, noted that the object was now due west; meaning it had moved north from the southwest.Even with the object dimming and moving north, which did not make sense for a star of planet, i decided that i likely had been watching venus. however,at 8:15 pm i observed "venus" split into two pieces, or became two objects. one object remained stationary, and the other object appeared to accelerate toward the ground. both objects appeared to fade away quickly after separating. remained outside looking for "venus", but it remained missing from the perfectly clear evening sky after separating into two pieces.
content.summary: Watching "venus", when it split in two!

content.detailedDescription: I was watching t.V. suddenly, the tubelight started to blink, i rushed and switched it off but it was still blinking, i was really scared, i switched the main fuse off. i saw the buildings around in my area which were lightened. i rushed on terrace but it was out of my sight....
content.summary: It took place around 11:30 pm, the electricity was affected and we could see a light on 4-5 buildings around in nearby areas

content.detailedDescription:
When i was about 5 years old i'm pretty sure i met an alien being
 it was hovering above the fence in my back yard. it looked somewhat like a lizard, but had what looked like smooth mossy almost transparent skin. it had a long tail and wings that rippled like a stingrays wings. including its tail it was probably 16 ft long. it didn't have arms or legs that i could see. something was glowing inside of where the chest cavity would be. it had big white eyes and a head like a gecko
 it told me telepathically that i shouldn't be afraid because it wasn't going to hurt me. i just want to know if anyone has seen anything similar to this.
content.summary: I saw a gecko like looking entity that could hover with it's wings

content.detailedDescription: Im a real estate photographer in south africa.  it was just after 12:47 and i took pics of the scenerey and especially the sea views from where i was. i didnt see or hear anything.  only when i got back home to upload all the pics did i found the anomaly.  i take three rapid shots in about a second for each photo. three different exposures then merge all three to render as one picture. the ufo only appeared on the first picture so in a zplit second it disappeared out of frame. this must have been super fast
content.summary: Took real estate pictures.  saw or heard nothing.  when i loaded on pc i saw anomaly

content.detailedDescription: Was going into house when i noticed this object moving west to east.. it seemed quick and to big for a satellite...
content.summary: Ufo   dawson creek?

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i went for a walk at around 9:30pm monday august first. we brought a blanket so we could lie on the grass in the courtyard by her condo and watch the stars.
 as she was getting comfortable on the blanket getting ready to snuggle when i saw the bright red light in the sky to the north. the big dipper was up and to the right of the light.
many planes fly by here since the airport is a few miles to the east so i thought at first that it was an airplane heading straight for us since it looked as though it was stationary.
then i noticed that there were no other lights so i thought it might be a light on one of the towers so i moved to see if i could see any other lights or the hillside and all i saw was the light and sky between it and the horizon. i couldn't figure it out so i started to lie down to snuggle and it was ruined by a ufo..The light or object dropped like a rock, not a leaf. then stopped..It didn't slow down or bounce it just stopped. i sat up real fast and my girlfriend was alarmed and wondering what was wrong..I told her and she sat up to watch the light. we watched it hover for a few minutes and then it shot to the west at incredible speed..It didn't have to build up speed. it just shot off to the west.  my girlfriend was freaked out and ran after it to if it was going to do anything else. she kept saying,"this is crazy, i have never seen anything like that in my life." "this is crazy"...

 we were in a courtyard between the condos so when the light took off it went behind the trees and condos. my girlfriend ives here so she ran to a clearing to see if she could see it again and where it was headed.
 my girlfriend was very excited and wanted to see it again..She wanted to stay out and watch for it to come back...Then she couldn't stop talking about it. then when we were in bed she opened the blinds to watch for it.
 i have seen many ufo's and i have seen 3 alien vehicles. with witnesses,in massachusetts, we saw 3 ships..Not just lights..That was in 1969. then again in 1976 there was a huge orb that looked like the moon was sitting over my house in riverton ,wyoming,.Then a huge ferris wheel looking object was over the ranch in laramie ,wyoming..
so i am very happy that my girlfriend and i saw one together because she didn't really believe my stories before...But it is such an incredible feeling knowing you saw something from another world and there is no doubt about it..

this is the most difficult thing about this is the lies from the powers that be and how they humiliate and discredit people..Good people who see these things and try to report them...You develop a huge resentment for a government who treats their people like this.
content.summary: We ere lying on a blanket watching the stars. we saw a bright red light hovering in one place. then it dropped then stopped. hovered for awhile the shot off to the west at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
We observed a large star-like object moving towards our location. the object grew larger in size then blinked out and was replaced with three objects in a triangular formation around where the original object was. these objects then flew off in different directions to the horizon and out of view. 

this is not our first encounter with objects in the skies at this location but was the most unique. 

the objects were in view for a few minutes until they went out of site. the original object was not seen again.
content.summary: Large star like object grew larger in size then as split into three objects in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
40.747250, -73.504271 is the latitude and longitude as close as i can get it. 

i was sitting in the passenger seat of a friends car and noticed a sphere/almost disk like object silver, very reflective. it was a short sighting. it moved in a strange path. a little but one way a little bit another for about 15 seconds, then decided to just go north. lost it behind trees. honestly i don't know what it was but nothing conventional. i mentioned it to my friend after i lost sight, not sure he believed me. i wanted to post this earlier but it's sort of a lame and short sighting. i just posted another sighting from may of 2016 and it hit me like a sack of bricks both sightings were practically over grumman. pretty much why i'm posting this and posted the previous one. i wasn't too shocked actually because it wasn't as strange or as long as a previous sighting i had. i was pretty excited that it was a classic silver/reflective sphere/almost disk shaped object.

i could be off on the time by at least an hour in either direction.

i hope some data exists on this and/or my previous report. i would be so happy.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very short sighting. never seen something so reflective in the sky moving in such a way.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a smoke before bed at around 11:15pm on august 2nd, 2016, when all of a sudden my attention was brought to the sky.  i am one to discredit stuff pretty quick but this was something ive never seen before in my 22 years of life.  the object was hovering with a  triangular patten of 3 solid red lights.  it was a lot bigger then anything i have ever seen in the sky and moving a rate that could not have been a plane or helicopter and made no noise.  

it almost appeared that another object that almost looked like a star was floating around it before it started to take off.  the only way i can put it into words is that it moved at least 50x faster then a regular plane in which i observed go by several minutes later.  

the bright red lights remained constant and moving at this speed until i could not to the object anymore.

this is the first time ive ever been lost for words, i honestly couldn't say anything except wow with my entire body covered in "goose bumps" while getting the chills on a very hot summer night.


ive always thought people were a bit looney saying they have seen ufo's but this has totally changed my views.  im still in total shock.
content.summary: Outside when my attention was brought to the sky, 3 red lights in a triangular formation moving faster and lower then all planes in the sky

content.detailedDescription: When i first noticed the ufo i was walking my neighbor's dog across the dam after visiting the lake. it was a little after 10:30 and it was a clear night. i was put on alert when the dog crouched down and started pulling me across the bridge. there were no one around and i hadnt seen a car all night. when i looked up i saw the ship and was trying to reason with myself as to what type of plane it could be. however, i quickly saw that it was too large of an aircraft to be flying so low and further more it had no visible propellants and an odd light formation. i hurried up the street and lost sight of it. a few blocks further i stopped to let the dog pee. when i turned i saw the ufo for the second time. as i watched it, it dipped down closer to the trees and emitted a beam of light. the outside of it was jagged looking, and it appeared to be a very solidly built ship. there were red blinking lights on the sides and unwavering white ones in the front and back. scared out of my mind, and firmly convinced it was not a government airplane, i sprinted the rest of the way home.
content.summary: Dark, dense, thick, multiple floors, white lights, red lights, large

content.detailedDescription:
I had gotten out of work and was waiting for a ride and i spotted something strange. all black, almost looked like a silhouette of a tiny person without distinct limb features. at first i thought it was just a bird gliding along and my eyes were messing with me. then it stopped dead in it's tracks for a few seconds before continuing at a pretty slow speed. as i adjusted my position and i got a better view i noticed no wings have flapped over the last few minutes so it couldn't be a bird. i also noticed a clear aura around it with a visible outline, it wasn't a colored outline or anything but it was visibly surrounding the object. it seemed relatively small and not very high in altitude but i really don't know for sure. it didn't move like anything i'd ever seen before.

(i posted a sighting recently that most likely was a satellite or the iss passing in the area above the horizon that makes objects look larger than they actually are [still doesn't account for the brightness or the fact that the data i was sent didn't match the direction.])

it moved around slowly never following a set path or direction and would stop and just hover for a couple of minutes at a time. it eventually started moving more north than east. my ride arrived i took my eyes off it for a second as it was obviously getting smaller from distance. when i tried to find it again it was gone. 

i was almost confused, slightly excited. i tried to rationalize what i was watching. i almost called over two men who were outside of a mechanic's shop i think to see if they were seeing what i was seeing and interpreting it the same way, but i didn't.
content.summary: Black strangely shaped object that appeared to have a visible but clear aura surrounding it.

content.detailedDescription: Seen from the bedroom of my house through a window. first spotted due to bright lights and straight flight path which at first made me think it was an airplane. upon closer inspection (i walked right up to the window) the object appeared to be the shape of an elongated pentagon at the bottom with a similarly shaped but slightly more rounded top. object had two steady bright white lights at the front of the craft, two of the same lights at the back and along the bottom there appeared to be three red lights that moved in formation ie. one at a time, then repeating. the object moved in a straight path across the sky and this along with the lights made me initially lose interest as i thought i was seeing a plane. something made me look harder however and a faint but still clear outline of the described shape could be seen by me. the object appeared to be moving at a speed slightly faster than normal for an aircraft and in a diagonal direction across my field of vision. object went behind cloud cover, flashed once through clouds and then was gone. immediately after i left the room to gather paper to draw the object from memory and told my father, the only other person awake, about the object.
content.summary: Missile/bowl like object spotted

content.detailedDescription: I'm a regular skywatcher, only i film with full spectrum night vision, or,. in the ultraviolet ranges not normally visible. through the month of july i have been catching sight of some kind of triangle formation, which appeared to be de-cloaking when meteors passed near, but yhis video shows things passing through the triangle, at incredible speeds. possibly some kind of portal or stargate? again, this happened throughout the month. in this video, something passes over my location , using the security camera as reference, i estimate it to be several thousand feet in altitude, but has no faa required strobes, and the shape is odd, several closeups are provided. also of note are the many lights that appear in the same area as the glowing triangle, so should be associated with this high altitude event. the camera's microphone is active, but didn't pick=up anything, audio is from camera, and case has a buffering effect.
content.summary: Short video of several anomalies recorded 7/28/2016

content.detailedDescription:
1. it was on the first floor of my house, drink in the kitchen.

2. i went to the terrace to see the object. 

3. i thought it was a ufo

4. it was a ball of light with orange lights and turned around , moved in a straight line .

5. i felt fear during and at the time of the sighting .

6. he moved to the galeras volcano and landed there .
content.summary: With my mother were on the first floor of the house, i heard my brother called me up the camcorder , because there was a ufo in the sky , i went up to the balcony where he stood with the video camera, i looked at the sky a star slightly larger than normal

content.detailedDescription: Contact channel 2 in st. louis for video
content.summary: Just saw video by man that was shown on fox news 2 5:30 august 2nd 2016

content.detailedDescription: Started  around 10 pm watching  three  ships  we are not alone  people?,?,,,,???,
content.summary: Watching  this for awhile walk around the  the  bushes there just in front of me  not moving  but  transformation to another  ship

content.detailedDescription: On approx 10:50pm on aug 1st, i stood on the balcony, looking northeast at 40 degree angle i observerved what i believed was a helicoptor, small plane or possibly a drone (to begin with), fly into into my view which seemed from my vantage point that it was directly over 101 freeway, the object moved slowly,then changed its light formation and structure. the light configuration of what seemed standard aviation lights (green, white,red) changed and morphed which left a clear silouette of a disc shape, the lights themselves changed colour, hue, and formation and intensity . then, suddenly, the lights (which had all turned white and ) faded out very quickly and disappeared,, it was as if the craft or object had completely disappeared in front of my eyes,, at no point did i think that anything had flew away,,the lights on the craft simply dimmed, and disappeared.To guesstimate the size is dificult, i believed the object to be the size of a helicopter,the incident lasted 2-3 minuites leaving me very little time to react or try to get evidence unfortunately.
content.summary: I saw what i thought to be a plane  helicopter or drone,, change its light formation then disappear near or over the 101 freeway in tempe az

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at aprox. 11:15 p. m. on i-80. august 1, 2016. saw a bright white light pulsating. following me home to roseville, ca. this is the 3rd time this has happened. there is no noise, not a helicopter, or plane. this object is white only. it goes directly from w. to e. then when i park my vehicle in my parking lot at home, it goes north to south. i did get video the first time as it was in a distance. the second time i saw this light was fri. night once again coming home from work. at that time there was a plane in the sky at the same time. this is not the first time my wife and i have seen ufo's. we are seniors, and we have seen quite a few in our life time. so this is not my or our first time. my wife and i have been together since 1995, and we together have seen aprox. 10 ufo's. all on different years and dates. all the ufo's have been different. some with blue, red, orange and white lights, a few silver disc during the day, triangle ufo's, in the 1997. we traveled by car in 1995 from ma. to sacramento, ca. in 1995. in province town, ma. when we first met we saw a circular one with colored lights and we lost time for 1/2 hour. we were in the car when this happened. this is our ufo history.
content.summary: Bright white light pulsating, followed i-80 w. from sacramento, to e. roseville

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was resting on rooftop
2. i was really attracted its shape and color and moreover it doesn't had any sound. so calm
3&4.I thought it might be a kite, then when i observe it ,i came to know that, it has no tail or rope on it.And it had a square shape and had attractive lights. and it was going away from my eyesight.
5.I was totally wondering because i had never seen a object similar to it. i tried to call my friends but it was too late when they came
6.It went far from me
content.summary: I am sure that its not a aircraft, helicopter,kite or any humenmade object. it was really strange and marvellous

content.detailedDescription: Was viewing 'stars' through binoculars then noticed a cluster in v shape move together across sky. then for following 2 weeks orbs began to show as spheres with multi-colored patterns in various hues like herolyphic paintings. then they began to appear as see-through spheres like soap bubbles and are dill present in trees as i write. also last nite for many hours in early am they descended to the porch and then followed me into the house and sure as i write this now one began to show me the way dark orbs swallow the positive energy orbs and then an orb appeared with typical alien face and flashed a light beam to earth when i asked where it was from. then i grew scared stiff and took cold shower but they yet remain as see-through spheres in trees. more to tell and if you will help me can provide footage and photos
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: This viewing has lasted weeks now. began with orbs in sky to holograms in house

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the beach near the tybee lighthouse with a friend. i noticed a movement in my peripheral and thought i was seeing a falling star/meteorite because it was moving in a downward angle pretty quickly, in the direction of the ocean. the only thing off was the color was vivid blue, like cerulean. it was leaving a very short tail in the same color. i pointed up to it for my friend and shouted, "what is that?" but by the time she looked up (within seconds) it, and the tail it left, had completely vanished. my friend didn't see it and then yelled at me when i asked again, louder, because she didn't want to disturb anyone with it being so late. 

i then thought maybe it was a flare or maybe a firework, but it winked out instead of fully descending and no one else seemed to have noticed it and nothing followed in its wake. no trails of smoke were visible in a clear sky. no boats or aircraft entered the area after its appearance looking for someone who might have fired a flare. i didn't even notice a plane the entire time we were there, which was over an hour. it was pretty high up, not and out over the water, but not as far over as the boats in the distance. so i am not sure what it was. i didn't even think, "ufo," until after it was gone and i had already tried to identify it with reasonable explanations.
content.summary: Blue light appeared, descended, vanished within seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Wile driving --dropping husband off at work to use his vehicle---during rush hour on i 95--- just before 8 am-- i am not sure the exact day-- but month was february.  cool weather-- clear sky -- no clouds-- object hovered about 200 feet from the ground about a mile-- mile half away-- above i 95-- no sound--glinted in the sunlight-- shiny metallic silver-- cone shaped with spire on top and bottom--- i reached to get my iphone-- to take a picture from my purse and shouted to my husband-- "look at that! what is it?"  -- he saw nothing-- and he was driving-- and he's pretty observant--- it blinked out after about 15 seconds-- just disappeared.  it was the size of a waste management vehicle-- not a balloon or drone.  i delayed reporting it because it was just wacked to see something like that and no one noticing or freaking out.  very bizarre.
content.summary: While traveling to drop husband off at work rush hr. on i 95 near ft. pierce exit-- saw object about a mile away--- size of a garbage truck--  cone shaped shilver mettallic in sunlight-- not a blimp or drone-- hovered had spire on top and bottom--

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
ufo 'observed summer 2016 . "
the time was 0:30 the may 31, 2016 when my family & i were in our beds. suddenly  a strange bright light appeared  outside our curtains and shined through our blinds.
we live on a quiet road outside the city and in front of the bedroom there is nothing else than the garden &
the fields where the cows are in the summer.
i got out of bed and rolled up to see what caused this sharp strange light that suddently blinded us throug the curtains as we first thought might be a tractor in the fields headlight that shined  directly into our window, but it turned out to be something completely different?
 in front of our or quiet dark house in the country.
  these strange lights up in the sky  that sporadically appeared in almost coded language.Turned on and of as the video shows.
i took my mobile and filmed as best i could with the phone in one hand and curtain  in the other
while i do not quite understand what it was my eyes so ....
there was all black in the sky no street lights for miles around and there were no lines in the sky indicating that perhaps it was flair or fireworks or otherwise explanatory.
they appeared as seen on the recording in the dark sky out in the middle of the field above
and there was no one other than us.
the light was bright and there was quite  !!! big round bright light / almost blinding spotlights turning on and of as the video shows -high
up in nothingness
it was not an airplane or firewors flairs or anything  else me and my family can think of as an logical explanation

so my family & i are quite sure that it was a ufo we observed or "the observed us"? this dark night in may.
content.summary: Appered through the window very sharp bright lights as the video shows filmed through the window no sound just blinking randomly  the sky was black and nothing  that could indicate that it could be explaned rationally  it was nothing like we ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from uni. my mum was driving. we were about 4 to 5 minutes away from our condo, and my mum says, "ann! look at the sky, there's something weird!" . so i leaned towards the car window on my left to get a view of it. now at this time we were maybe 25 to 35 meters away from where the ufo was stationery. i quickly took out my phone and took a video, zooming into what initially looked like a giant lantern with flashy bright lights which switched colours from purple to blue to a yellowish golden color. or maybe it was a drone, i thought to myself. that was when my camera stopped recording unfortunately but when we got nearer to the ufo, i noticed that this thing was huge. i was so shocked and speechless to even see it it was 100% not a plane as it was really big. it was higher than a tree but not high enough to be a plane. plus, it looked like an irregular object, an indescribable shape. there were multiple colored led lights which formed a ring for each colour, green, yellow, red , blue , purple, almost like a rainbow, forming a giant circle and these lights were attached to the ufo . the ufo it self was a grayish metal ish looking like object, it wasn't that clear because it was outshines by the very very flashy lights. we got home in 1 a minute or two and i immediately call my friend because she lived closer to the ufo sighting spot and i asked her to rush out of her house to look for that thing but she didn't see anything and when i sent her the video she was so surprised that she had missed such bright lights in the sky. i'm so clueless about this. i don't know what this is, i have no explanation whatsoever. all i know is that it was too big to be a drone or a plane. i hope someone can help me out with this.
content.summary: The ufo was big, and it was in a shape i couldn't describe.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a storm cloud coming from the north with lightning flashing around inside it. it was springtime and lighting storms are rare in our area. as it got closer i notice it's not just white flashes but red and white. that caught my attention. as it passed over my car you could see into the cloud for a couple of seconds.It was some kind of large craft with red and white lights flashing around on it. i would judge the size to be about 1000 feet long. you could see one end out of the drivers window and the front of it out of the passengers window. a very bright red beam was flashing down on the ground and moving around like it was searching for something.The craft was using a cloud like screen to conceal itself and until it went right over head you couldn't see inside the cloud. if it wasn't for the different colored lights and the red beam shinning down you wouldn't have even known that it wasn't a low fast moving storm cloud. very strange craft.The car ahead of me slowed to a crawl myself and two other cars behind me were just barely moving when the craft went over. every one was looking up at this craft. maybe some of the other people has already reported this incident. this is the third time i have witnessed strange crafts that i know for a fact are nothing made on this planet. one up close daylight sighting in the 80s. two at night but close enough to see they were not normal aircraft.
content.summary: Ufo flew over car

content.detailedDescription: Went outside around 12:15-30am and looked up to a clear night sky and noticed a bright orb right under the big dipper and thought it may had been a satellite but it seemed to bright. it made no noise and had a consistent speed and angle then suddenly disappeared as it passed the perseus constellation. i took video of it with my phone which has 4k resolution for video. i took about 3 minutes of tracking it zoomed in to see if i could see any kind of lights or blinking and it stayed solid white that out shined all the stars. when i took the video the stars are dim enough to not show but the orb is completely visible. it was completely silent so it wasn't a plane especially since i live with in a couple miles of an active navy base and see and hear almost every type of plane on a daily basis. only things i could think of is i caught the iss or a low orbit satellite with very unusual path or a ufo also after i lost site of it my wife noticed it reappear east of us then just disappeared again. i am trying to shrink the video size since it is almost 2gb and with out a beefy video card it's choppy. i can try to send stills or compress the 4k vid and send it.
content.summary: Bright orb suddenly appeared under the big dipper and dissappeared passing perseus

content.detailedDescription: A similar ufo to last night appeared again at 280 degrees west of our location. tonight we attempted to use a telescope to view the object and although the telescope was centered on object, only blurred light showed through. viewed through binoculars at 10x50 magnification. we were able to see a disc shaped object, flat at a 120 degree angle with lights on top and bottom in the middle of the disc. the top light was brighter and white, the bottom light strobed blue, red, green and yellow-orange in a random order. the object moved up, down, sharply to the left and right and at odd angles. a second object of similar make, but further away came in about 20 degrees from the horizon and from approximately 220 degrees ssw. it moved north of the brighter object and up to approx 30 degrees and remained located at a 120 degree angle from the object at approx 310 degrees wnw of the main object. it moved in a similar but random pattern once it came across approx 10 mins after sighting of the first ufo. two air force fighter jets were in the sky flying in a circular pattern around the ufo at approx 18 degrees to the horizon, never moving higher. an air force surveillance plane was seen crossing the area from the north. none of the aircraft landed at hill afb, 1 mile east of our home that we could tell. the fighter aircraft moved off after 12 mins to the south away from the base and the surveillance plane appeared to be on a heading to salt lake international airport where an ang base is also located. it was in the area of the ufo for no longer than 8 mins. we observed the ufo for one hour, six minutes before going in for the night. four of us viewed the objects through the binoculars and all agreed on the shapes and colors we were seeing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Similar to event reported in mufon report 78101

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv with a friend. then i fell asleep on the couch. woke up feeling like i was being watched. then felt paralyzed. couldn't move, tried to speak but couldn't. tried to call for help, and could not. looked with my eyes and saw a bright white light out the sliding glass door, that was behind the back of the couch i was on. then 3 black figures emerged with glowing white eyes. no more than 3-4 feet tall, reminded me of owls. i tried to scream for help but couldn't speak. then everything disappeared and i was able to move again. ever since i have felt a sence of being watched and feel depersonalization symptoms
content.summary: 3 dark humanoid figures with big white eyes above me in my bed with a bright light outside the window

content.detailedDescription: Wtf, way faster then a  jet plane or drone, can someone interpret the spanish of my neighbor? in the video, by the time i can get video was to late, this thing was big a hovering over us, very big, i know from boating red and green is starboard and port, as this has red and green, but these lights where not like that, way to vibrant?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This moved faster than any aircraft can travel, it did hover but was diffently not a helicopter

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared one month earlier hovering slowly in the sky it was distant and you could not tell what it was until i took out my telescope in the middle of the day. it was incredible to see a material that was both see through and reflective the first time i saw it it was heading east and then when i saw it on july 30th it was heading southwest. the second time i saw the object he was directly overhead distant but very visible with binoculars or a telescope this time i decided to attempt to take a picture of it when i pulled out my phone and activated my camera and pointed it at the object to my surprise my phome started hqving bad interference across the screen i've never seen interference like this on my phone and the object did not show up when i looked through my phone at it the pictures all came out was static as well.Through my telescope the object appeared to be like a flattened sphere with approximately 14 lights on either end of it. i could see through the outer shell to something on the inside that was rotating around it leaving trace lines on the outside i was able to observe it for over 30 minutes with a telescope in detail and still have no idea what it could be. it appeared quite large but so far away it was hard to tell. the object slowly across the sky in a sort of wobbly motion. similar to the head of a jellyfish
content.summary: A translucent material i've never seen very large see in great detail with a telescope in the middle of the day. the object had something rotating inside and affected the camera in my cell phone
